formula: For any m>=1, for k such that 5*3^k+3>12m, a((5*3^k+3-12*m)/6)= m. For example, for k>=1, a((5*3^k-9)/6) = 1. - _Benoit Cloitre_, Oct 31 2002
maple: A046901 := proc(n) option remember; if n = 1 then 1 else if A046901(n-1)>n then A046901(n-1)-n else A046901(n-1)+n; fi; fi; end;
program: a046901_list = scanl1 (\u v -> if u > v then u - v else u + v) [1..]
